info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:58PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN RUTHERFORD AND POLK COUNTIES UNTIL 1245 AM EDT... At 1158 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Forest City to 7 miles northeast of Columbus to 14 miles east of Hendersonville, and moving southwest at 10 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Forest City, Columbus, Rutherfordton, Tryon, Lake Lure, Saluda, Bostic, Chimney Rock Village, Chimney Rock State Park and Spindale. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: The combination of gusty winds and saturated soil conditions will cause scattered trees and power lines to fall. Seek shelter inside an interior room.
